history.proof: intros x. unfold Cmod. strivial use: sqrt_plus_sqr unfold: fst, C, snd.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of sqrt_Rsqr_abs (sqrt _²) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment x : C Unable to unify "?M2367 < Rabs ?M2367 \\/ ?M2367 = Rabs ?M2367" with "(sqrt (fst x * (fst x * 1) + snd x * (snd x * 1)))² < (sqrt 2 * Rmax (Rabs (fst x)) (Rabs (snd x)))² \\/ (sqrt (fst x * (fst x * 1) + snd x * (snd x * 1)))² = (sqrt 2 * Rmax (Rabs (fst x)) (Rabs (snd x)))²".

In environment x : C Unable to unify "0 < Rabs ?M2367 \\/ 0 = Rabs ?M2367" with "(sqrt (fst x * (fst x * 1) + snd x * (snd x * 1)))² < (sqrt 2 * Rmax (Rabs (fst x)) (Rabs (snd x)))² \\/ (sqrt (fst x * (fst x * 1) + snd x * (snd x * 1)))² = (sqrt 2 * Rmax (Rabs (fst x)) (Rabs (snd x)))²".

original: intros x. unfold Cmod. rewrite sqrt_Rsqr_abs. apply Rsqr_incr_0_var. simpl. apply Rle_abs. apply Rabs_pos.
